submit.title: Submit your mushroom inquiry
submit.referenceHint: Use this code to find your submission later:
submit.thankYouHint: You'll receive a reply as soon as an expert has reviewed your images.

steps.title: Click the purple button below to add the first mushroom
steps.hint: Take one photo from the top, one from the side, and one from underneath. Good lighting and a neutral background help the identification.

steps.title: Remember the reference code after submission
steps.hint: You‚Äôll receive a reference code when you submit. Use this code to check your results later.

steps.title: Our experts will review your photos
steps.hint: You'll get a response within 1‚Äì2 days. Use the reference code to check back.

stepDescription.top: Picture from the top of the mushroom
stepDescription.side: Picture from the side of the mushroom
stepDescription.under: Picture from the bottom of the mushroom

validation.errorMushroomMissing: You must add at least one mushroom before submitting.

home.description: Not sure if you've picked liberty caps? Submit a free and anonymous request here:

membership.title: Become a Member ‚Äì Support Soppidentifikasjon.no!
membership.intro: Would you like to help keep Soppidentifikasjon.no running and assist others with safe mushroom picking? As a member, you support our work in covering operational costs and compensating our mushroom experts.

support.title: Need help?
support.intro: Here you‚Äôll find answers to common questions and how to contact us.

faq1.question: How does the mushroom identification service work?
faq1.answer: You upload photos and receive a response within 1‚Äì2 days.

faq2.question: How do I use my reference code?
faq2.rest: and enter the code you received.

faq3.question: Can I request a new evaluation?
faq3.answer: Yes, upload new photos and submit a new request.
